p: Three cohort studies [ 44, 45, 48] and one case control studies [ 38] were included to compare mild/moderate versus severe/critical COVID-19 stages in COVID-19/TB co-infected patients. The pooled result revealed that the COVID-19/TB group was at high risk of developing severe/critical COVID-19 compared to the COVID-19 group OR 4.50 (95%CI 1.12–18.10, P = 0.03). The test of heterogeneity was not statistically significant P = 0.16, I 2 = 42% (Fig. 4).
